name: The Gatherer
credits:
Rita-Bernstein - Character art, ZHS translation
Jedi - RUS translation
MappyTheKat - Old character splash art
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 7 relics.

v1.0.6 (2020-11-30)
- Update for Slay the Spire v2.2
- Mind Search now considers your current energy while determining Lesser Energy Potion probability.

Visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1611788501 for full change notes.
